skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Reach into a new world of possibilities using the coviva controller and combine it with Amazon Alexa to simplify your daily life. It is as easy as asking Alexa to turn lights on or off, adjust dimmers and control your thermostatic valves and the Tado thermostat.
Please note that it is essential that you own a preconfigured coviva controller and that you download and install the application linked to a Berker account. You will also need to have a configured Alexa device linked to your account.
In the Alexa App, enable the access to your coviva account and you are ready to talk.
When using the skill, you can launch a scene or control products of your home installation, such as:
“Alexa, set the bathroom temperature to 23 degrees please”
"Alexa, turn on kitchen light”
"Alexa, turn on good morning”
If you make changes to your products in coviva, launch a scan of the devices with your voice or using the Amazon Alexa application.
Please contact your local electrician to find out more about the coviva controller.
